text: va kasone, ki da'vati Parvardigorasonro ʙo icro namudani amrhojas icoʙat kardand va pajomʙaronro ito'at kardand va namozro dar vaqtas ʙo rioja kardani sartu odoʙ va arkonas ʙarpo guzostand va korason ʙar pojai masvarat ʙo jakdigar ast va az on ci ʙa onho ruzi dodaem, dar rohi Alloh ʙar nijozmandon sarf mekunand
